verdict: Conversion tracking severely polluted with 4 irrelevant Smart campaign actions as Primary; ROAS misleading

checks.name: Conversion actions defined
checks.finding: 8 conversion actions configured

checks.name: Micro vs macro separation
checks.finding: Cart completed set as Primary (micro). 4 Smart campaign actions set as Primary: Smart campaign calls, directions, ad clicks to call, map clicks to call. These are irrelevant legacy actions inflating conversions

checks.name: No duplicate counting
checks.finding: Multiple overlapping call actions: Calls from ads + Website Click To Call + Smart campaign calls + Smart campaign ad clicks to call — quadruple counting phone interactions

checks.name: GA4 linked and flowing
checks.finding: GA4 purchase is Primary and tracking revenue

checks.name: Smart campaign cleanup
checks.finding: 4 Smart campaign conversion actions still set as Primary despite no Smart campaigns running. These ghost actions pollute all campaign bidding

checks.name: Search term audit recency
checks.finding: Branded search campaigns active — search term review cadence unknown

checks.name: Wasted spend on irrelevant terms
checks.finding: PMax spends $13,441 (70% of total) with 56.4 conv at $238 CPA. Miami branded search: $377 for 1 conversion ($377 CPA). Significant waste potential

checks.name: Budget allocation waste
checks.finding: PMax gets 70% of budget but ROAS is poor. Branded search campaigns for NY and Boston are far more efficient but get only 28% of spend

checks.name: Campaign naming convention
checks.finding: Consistent CTM prefix with location identifiers

checks.name: Campaign count per objective
checks.finding: 88 total campaigns with 84 paused — extreme bloat from multiple agency handoffs

checks.name: Brand vs Non-Brand separation
checks.finding: Brand campaigns exist by location but no non-brand search present. PMax handles all non-brand but with no visibility

checks.name: PMax present for eligible accounts
checks.finding: PMax - All Stations campaign active covering all locations

checks.name: Budget allocation matches priority
checks.finding: Miami branded search gets only $377 (1 conv) — market may not be ready. NY and Boston brand get roughly equal budget despite different market sizes

checks.name: Brand keyword Quality Score
checks.finding: NY branded 21.1% CTR and Boston branded 20.4% CTR — excellent brand QS

checks.name: Keyword coverage
checks.finding: Only branded terms in Search. No non-brand search campaigns for spa services, treatments, or location-based queries

checks.name: Match type distribution
checks.finding: Unable to assess match type details from available data

checks.name: CTR vs industry benchmark
checks.finding: Brand CTR 20-21% is excellent. PMax CTR 5.1% is above average for PMax

checks.name: PMax audience signals
checks.finding: Single PMax for all 3 cities — audience signals may not be granular enough per market

checks.name: PMax brand cannibalization
checks.finding: PMax 'All Stations' likely capturing brand searches alongside brand campaigns — no brand exclusion visible

checks.name: Smart bidding strategy active
checks.finding: All campaigns use smart bidding (Max Conv Value or Max Conversions)

checks.name: Budget constrained campaigns
checks.finding: Brand SIS 91-93% is excellent. PMax SIS 10% suggests very broad targeting or limited budget relative to market

checks.name: Miami campaign viability
checks.finding: Miami brand search: 243 impr, $377 spend, 1 conv. Market may need different approach or more budget to reach critical mass

quickWins.action: Set all 4 Smart campaign conversion actions to Secondary immediately — they inflate conversions and corrupt bidding
Set Cart completed to Secondary — micro conversion inflating count
Remove duplicate call tracking — keep only Calls from ads + Website Click To Call as Primary
Evaluate Miami branded search — consider pausing if market not yet viable ($377 for 1 conv)
Add brand exclusion to PMax All Stations to prevent cannibalization of cheaper branded clicks

items: Clean conversion tracking: Only GA4 Purchase + Calls from ads + Website Click To Call as Primary
Remove all Smart campaign conversion actions from Primary
After conversion cleanup, let bidding recalibrate for 2 weeks
Split PMax by location — separate asset groups for NYC, Boston, Miami with location-specific creative
Launch non-brand Search campaigns for high-intent spa services (e.g., 'facial near me', 'spa NYC')
Re-evaluate Miami market — build dedicated non-brand strategy or pause until brand awareness grows
Shift budget from PMax to non-brand Search once launched and performing
Build Customer Match lists from booking system data
Test Demand Gen for seasonal promotions and gift card pushes
Implement server-side tracking for more accurate booking attribution
